p:
The analysis of primary structure of the spike protein fragment SARS-CoV-2 shows that it has 193 amino acid residues. Similarly, secondary structure analysis with PDBsum
20 , shows that this protein fragment contains 3 sheets, 1 beta hairpin, 2 beta bulges, 9 strands, 6 helices, 1 helix-helix interaction, 14 beta turns, 4 gamma turns and 2 disulfide bonds.
